item.title: About Me
item.description: I am lead software engineer at DESKi, ex engineering manager at Coyote. At DESKi, I am currently leading Heart Focus Android application development using Qt/QML/C++ stack building tools to acquire echo exams using ImFusion Suite doing some data engineering around acquired echo exams using Python/Numpy/Pandas/Matplotlib I spent 10 years at Coyote, heading up mobile & automotive software development teams, and Bordeaux office.
